Test Name: Amphetamines Confirmation (Chain of Custody, Random, Urine)
Purpose: To confirm and quantify amphetamines in urine specimens for random drug testing while preserving chain-of-custody integrity.
Equipment: Gas Chromatography–Mass Spectrometry (GC-MS) or Liquid Chromatography–Tandem Mass Spectrometry (LC-MS/MS); analytical balance; centrifuge; vortex mixer; micropipettes
